text: Nicholas Donabet Kristof (born April 27, 1959) is an American journalist and political commentator. He is the winner of two Pulitzer Prizes. He is a regular CNN contributor and has written an op-ed column for The New York Times since November 2001. His works focuses on human rights abuses and social injustices, such as human trafficking and the Darfur conflict. ==References== Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American political commentators Category:American human rights activists Category:American columnists Category:CNN people Category:American progressives Category:American political writers Category:Journalists from Oregon Category:Journalists from Chicago Category:American bloggers
title: Nicholas Kristof
